mapper.update: update request_info set BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESC = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_NAME = #{contName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_TELE = #{contTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, FINISH_DATE = #{finishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, EXPECT_FINISH_DATE = #{expectFinishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, REQUEST_TYPE = #{requestType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_TYPE = #{actionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVITI_KEY = #{activitiKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_URGENT_TYPE = #{requestUrgentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_TYPE = #{processType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSTARTUP = #{isstartup,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ATTR_VAL = #{attrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEST_TYPE = #{testType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PST_DATE = #{pstDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROD_DATE = #{prodDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OUTLINE_DESIGN = #{outlineDesign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEST_POINTS = #{testPoints,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JT_CONT_NAME = #{jtContName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JT_CONT_TELE = #{jtContTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATCH_SERIAL = #{patchSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_tag = #{reportTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where REQUEST_TEMPLATE_INST_ID = #{requestTemplateInstId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
